name: kMDItemDisplayName
description: The localized version of the file name.

name: kMDItemFSContentChangeDate
description: The date the file contents last changed.

name: kMDItemFSCreationDate
description: The date and time that the file was created.

name: kMDItemFSInvisible
description: Indicates whether the file is invisible.

name: kMDItemFSIsExtensionHidden
description: Indicates whether the file extension of the file is hidden.

name: kMDItemFSLabel
description: Index of the Finder label of the file. Possible values are 0 through 7.

name: kMDItemFSName
description: The file name of the item.

name: kMDItemFSNodeCount
description: Number of files in a directory.

name: kMDItemFSOwnerGroupID
description: The group ID of the owner of the file.

name: kMDItemFSOwnerUserID
description: The user ID of the owner of the file.

name: kMDItemFSSize
description: The size, in bytes, of the file on disk.

name: kMDItemPath
description: The complete path to the file.
